import {useState} from 'react'; import './lessonstyleone.css'; const LessonStyleOne = ({words}) => { const [translate, setTranslate ] = useState(false) return(
  • {translate ?

    {words.zero.translation}

    :

    Zero

    }
  • {translate ?

    {words.one.translation}

    :

    One

    }
  • {translate ?

    {words.two.translation}

    :

    Two

    }
  • {translate ?

    {words.three.translation}

    :

    Three

    }
  • {translate ?

    {words.four.translation}

    :

    Four

    }
  • {translate ?

    {words.five.translation}

    :

    Five

    }
  • {translate ?

    {words.six.translation}

    :

    Six

    }
  • {translate ?

    {words.seven.translation}

    :

    Seven

    }
  • {translate ?

    {words.eight.translation}

    :

    Eight

    }
  • {translate ?

    {words.nine.translation}

    :

    Nine

    }
) }; export default LessonStyleOne;
